ns2:workflow.display-name: IBSE Lab Access Request for Customers
ns2:workflow.description: Provides vRA XaaS service to allow Iberia SE team ask for external access to the lab (for final customers only)

param.name: in_access_deadline
param.description: Blank or null means permanent access request

param.name: in_overall_description
param.description: Short detail about the test or project

attrib.name: var_IBSE_contact_name
attrib.description: Will be extrated from the request

attrib.name: var_IBSE_contact_email
attrib.description: Will be extrated from the request
